note.p: Education: Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1881, Senior Wrangler and 1st Smith's Prizeman), MA

Career: Fellow, Trinity College, Cambridge (1881-1910); Professor of Mathematics, University College, Liverpool (1882-1883); Lecturer and Assistant Tutor, Trinity College, Cambridge (1884-1895); Sadlerian Professor of Pure Mathematics, Cambridge University (1895-1910); Chief Professor of Mathematics, Imperial College, London (1913-1923)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 209-227, plate, by E T Whittaker
